pullRequest.title: Sb conan lockfile
pullRequest.bodyText: Added two Conan detectors: One for a conan.lock file, if found. If not, Detect falls back to a Conan CLI detector which parses the output of "conan info".

nodes.bodyText: I really like this approach. We should do this more often.
It seemed like parsing and model were well separated but here the builder does the parsing? I think ideally this would be in some kind of parser.
I don't love having this code here. Do we follow this pattern in other detectables? Is this something we want to do for all detectables?
Should gson be a constructor parameter?

commit.message: refactor: conan: incorporating code review feedback

style(doc): added RNote and doc for Conan

nodes.bodyText: Since this class contains no state this could be a static method.  That way you don't have to instantiate it first.
